title: Bug 17703: Edit Add Task action should use Workbench dialog as Java Editor does
OB: When executing the File -> Add Task action by selecting a CU (Compilation Unit) in the packages view and pressing F1, a different dialog is displayed compared to executing the same action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
EB: The Edit Add Task action should use the same dialog as the Java Editor does when executing the action from the ruler context menu.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Select a Compilation Unit (CU) in the packages view.
2. Press F1.
3. Observe that a different dialog is displayed compared to executing the same action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
